column5: When does yours expire? It is time to check!!

I took care of that last fall. I went over to my local Walgreen's store and stood with my back to the ice cream cooler and used the pull down background. The person at the photo counter was ready to take my picture and the flash would not go off. He told me to hold my head down just a bit, there was too much reflection coming off my forehead so the camera flash was sensing too much light. I know I have a receding hairline but how about a break for something as simple as a passport picture? I just can't win.
